availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, barber. Virginia native. Married to Julia Ann Finnie Smith in Franklin County, Kentucky on November 24, 1863. Father of Fielding Smith. Barber in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Barber in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 32A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort/District 1, p. 234.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film #005552484, p. 227.
"The will of the late Peter Smith," The Frankfort Roundabout (Frankfort, KY), October 13, 1883, p. 3.
"Acrostic," The Frankfort Roundabout (Frankfort, KY), September 29, 1883, p. 2.
